Calculator¶

Source code for Calculator by RunySoft

calculator.Addition(a, b)[source]¶

Mathematical Addition: Adds viariables a and b.

Parameters:
  • a (number) – Addition parameter
  • b (number) – Addition parameter
Returns:

retVal - value of this operation

  • Special Cases:

    n/a

  • Example:

    Addition(1,0)

  • Expected Success Response:

    1
calculator.Division(a, b)[source]¶

Mathematical Division: Divides variables a and b

Parameters:
  • a (number) – Value to divide
  • b (number) – Division value
Returns:

retVal - value of this operation.

  • Special Cases:

    Division(a,0); a is from (-inf,+inf) -- Returns None

  • Example:

    Division(4,2)

  • Expected Success Response:

    2
calculator.Exponentiation(a, b)[source]¶

Mathematical Exponentiation: Calculates the value of a to the power of b

Parameters:
  • a (number) – Base of the exponentiation
  • b (number) – Exponent
Returns:

retVal - value of this operation

  • Special Cases:

    Exponentiation(a,0); a is from (-inf,+inf) -- Returns 1

  • Example:

    Exponentiation(2,1)

  • Expected Success Response:

    2
calculator.Factorial(a)[source]¶

Mathematical Factiorial: Calculates the value of a!

Parameters:a (number) – Value to calculate the factorial of
Returns:retVal - value of this operation

  • Special Cases:

    Factorial(0) -- Returns:  1
Factorial(a); a is not from N + {0} -- Returns None

  • Example:

    Factorial(2)

  • Expected Suceess Response:

    2
calculator.Log(a, b)[source]¶

Mathematical Logarithm: Calculates the value of logarithm of a to base b

Parameters:
  • a (number) – Value to calculate the logarith of
  • b (number) – Base of the logarithm
Returns:

retVal - value of this operaton

  • Special Cases:

    Log(a,b); a or b is <0 -- Returns None

  • Example:

    Log(10,10)

  • Expected Success Result:

    1
calculator.Multiplication(a, b)[source]¶

Mathematical Muliplication: Multiplies varibles a and b

Parameters:
  • a (number) – Vale to multiply
  • b (number) – Multiplication value
Returns:

retVal - value of this operation

  • Special Cases:

    n/a

  • Example:

    Multiplication(2,2)

  • Expected Success Response:

    4
calculator.Root(a, b)[source]¶

Mathematical Root: Calculates the value of b th root of a

Parameters:
  • a (number) – Base of the root
  • b (number) – Degree of the root
Returns:

retVal - value of this operation

  • Special Cases:

    Root(a); a is <0 -- Return None

  • Example:

    Root(8,3)

  • Expected Success Result:

    2
calculator.Subtraction(a, b)[source]¶

Mathematical Substraction:: Subtracts variables a and b.

Parameters:
  • a (number) – Value to subtract from
  • b (number) – Subtraction value
Returns:

retVal - value of this operation

  • Special Cases:

    n/a

  • Example:

    Subtraction(3,2)

  • Expected Success Response:

    1
